title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Innovating Mathematics Education Design Through Comparison of Instructional Design and Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Compare and explain the historical backgrounds and philosophical approaches of instructional design (ID) and learning design (LD)
Analyze and discuss methodological differences between ID and LD using metaphor-based discourse analysis
Design and apply a third-space (integrated design) approach applicable to mathematics instruction, incorporating real-world case studies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
